mobiles.name: drakiri leçantra bayan
mobiles.long_description: Parýldayan mavi cüppesinin içinde kanatlý bir bayan birþey üzerinde çalýþýyor.
mobiles.description:
Sparkling silver eyes regard you serenely from a fine boned çora face.
Iridescent wings arch from the shoulder blades, spreading behind the lady
in a glittering cloak.  The aura of power surrounding her is nearly
tangible.  You notice a glittering symbol in silvery-blue in the center of
her forehead:

                             ((+*+))

mobiles.name: drakiri deriki norek lord
mobiles.long_description: Karanlýk ve yakýþýklý bir drakiri merakla seni izliyor.
mobiles.description:
Wavy black hair frames a sharp featured çora face, in stark contrast
with the pale skin.  Intelligent silver eyes regard you warily.  A
mark on the hem of his clothing indicates his rank as consort to the head
of major house Deriki, Lechandre.

mobiles.name: drakiri deriki dirli bayan
mobiles.long_description: Bir drakiri bayaný burada, çalýþýyor.
mobiles.description:
Golden blonde hair is tied securely back, revealing pointed ears and
flowing in waves over delicate iridescent wings.  The lady, engrossed in
her experiment, does not seem to notice you.  She wears the insignia of
she'vale Deriki and the mark of the first in command.

mobiles.name: drakiri deriki roveni
mobiles.long_description: Narin bir drakiri burada bekliyor.
mobiles.description:
The second in command of house Deriki, Roweni wields formidable power.
She bears the fine boned features of an çora and the iridescent wings
of the fae.  Pale green eyes watch you measuringly.

mobiles.name: drakiri deriki zanil erkek
mobiles.long_description: Mavi cüppesiyle bir drakiri erkeði birþeyler karalýyor.
mobiles.description:
A ponytail of silvery hair hangs over the man's shoulder as he bends over
a stack of parchment.  He bears the mark of the treye, third in command,
of she'vale Deriki.

mobiles.name: drakiri deriki tirena bayan
mobiles.long_description: Genç bir drakiri bayaný burada çalýþýyor.
mobiles.description:
You notice raven black hair and delicate iridescent wings.  Apparently
noticing your scrutiny, the girl turns towards you, fixing you with
a serious silver gaze.  A silvery blue dot shimmers between her eyebrows,
marking her as the heir to Deriki.  When she comes into full power, the
dot will be replaced by the house crest.

mobiles.name: drakiri deriki nalis kýz
mobiles.long_description: Bir drakiri kýzý sena þeytanca gülümsüyor.
mobiles.description:
The girl's silver eyes sparkle with laughter as she watches you watching
her.  A narrow mark along one cheekbone denotes her as one of the
younger siblings (ira'deia) of the heir.

mobiles.name: drakiri deriki deman genç
mobiles.long_description: Genç bir drakiri bir büyüye konsantre oluyor.
mobiles.description:
The intelligent silver eyes are narrowed in concentration as he practices,
seemingly oblivious to your presence.  A blue mark along his cheekbone
indicates that he is a younger sibling of the Deriki heir.

mobiles.name: drakiri deriki yýkades genç
mobiles.long_description: Kanatlý bir genç bir yokoluyor bir varoluyor.
mobiles.description:
He seems to be perfecting his invisibility and cancellation spells.
Noticing your intrusion, the youth glances up, flipping back short
golden locks to examine you with curious grey-silver eyes.  He
bears the mark of an ira'deian, or younger child, along one cheekbone.

mobiles.name: zeyon kar baykuþ
mobiles.long_description: Mavi buz renginde bir kay baykuþu seni izliyor, DÝKKATLE!.
mobiles.description: Huge dark eyes examine you curiously.

mobiles.name: drakiri laboratuvar asistaný
mobiles.long_description: Bir asistan heyecanla deney düzenekleri oluþturuyor.
mobiles.description: He seems a little harried and glares at you for getting in the way.

mobiles.name: eðitim yapan büyücü
mobiles.long_description: Eðitim yapan bir büyücü görüyorsun, konsantre olmaya çalýþýyor.
mobiles.description:
The mage seems intent on a spell and unaware of your scrutiny.
Suddenly, one hand flicks forward and a fireball whooshes past your
ear!  Ack!  The mage glares at your interruption and mumbles something
about idiots and fried brains.  An odor of singed hair wafts from
your left ear.

mobiles.name: hayaletimsi kývranan þekil
mobiles.long_description: Hayaletimsi bir þekil burada, kývranýyor.
mobiles.description:
A transparent form hovers here, writhing and moaning.  It seems
to be trapped in one place by some kind of magic which apparently
holds despite the form's continuous lashing.

mobiles.name: glip koruma
mobiles.long_description: Koruyucu bir glip burada bekliyor.
mobiles.description:
It seems to be made of semi-transparent substance shaped in the form
of a magical glyph, created to guard the house against outside threats.

mobiles.name: drakiri lord dosande
mobiles.long_description: Parlak beyaz bir drakiri lordu ani varlýðýný fakedince bir kaþýný kaldýrýyor.
mobiles.description:
Light seems to focus on this figure, surrounding the lord with an aura
of gold.  Shining hair is held back by a slender circlet, revealing
a handsome, sculpted face and narrow, almost slitted, tawny eyes.
A golden symbol shimmers between his brows:

                          ((-*-))

mobiles.name: drakiri denilis bayan
mobiles.long_description: Kanatlý güzel bir bayan þehrin dýþýný izliyor.
mobiles.description:
Shining gold hair catches the light, surrounding the lady with a faint
golden halo.  Bright blue eyes gaze back at you serenely.  You sense
an aura of great power behind the gentle smile.

mobiles.name: drakiri kayele
mobiles.long_description: Bir drakiri burada, bir komut aurasý yayýyor.
mobiles.description:
Powerful golden eyes catch and hold your gaze for a moment, and
one eyebrow raises in question.  He bears the mark of a sh'ayan
on his collar.

mobiles.name: drakiri reksena diþi
mobiles.long_description: Diþi bir drakiri burada bekliyor.
mobiles.description:
A cascade of white streaked golden hair flows in waves over one shoulder.
Despite the white strands, the pale face betrays a youthful power,
and her stance betrays an aura of authority.  She bears the mark of
the Treniste sequas, the second in command.

mobiles.name: drakiri deyis erkek
mobiles.long_description: Erkek bir drakiri burada bekliyor.
mobiles.description:
Gold flecked blue eyes watch you measuringly from a handsome elvish
face.  On his collar is the mark of the treye, third in command,
of house Treniste.

mobiles.name: drakiri liren kýz
mobiles.long_description: Narin bir drakiri kýzý birþeyler okuyor.
mobiles.description:
Golden hair frames a narrow fine boned face and large tawny eyes.
Though slight, honed muscles betray continuous weapons training and
a catlike speed.  A golden dot on her forehead marks this girl as
the Treniste na'deia, or heir.

mobiles.name: drakiri josreke genç
mobiles.long_description: Beyazlara bürünmüþ bir genç notlar alýyor.
mobiles.description:
He seems focused on a huge blue bound tome.  A glance at the lettering
along the spine indicates that it has something to do with magic.
Along one cheekbone, you notice the tiny mark of a Treniste ira'deian.

mobiles.name: drakiri rodven kýz
mobiles.long_description: Genç bir kýz kýlýç hakimiyetini geliþtiriyor.
mobiles.description:
Steel flashes like lightning as the girl moves through several
maneuvers with a speed and agility that make it seem like a dance.
Noticing your scrutiny, she pauses, and you notice the mark of
an ira'deia along one cheekbone.

mobiles.name: drakiri beyaz paladin
mobiles.long_description: Beyazlara bürünmüþ bir paladin seni izliyor.
mobiles.description:
The paladin seems to follow your every move, as if measuring your
worth.

mobiles.name: drakiri racal bayan
mobiles.long_description: Kuzgun gibi saçlara sahip bir drakiri bayaný þeytanlýk yayýyor.
mobiles.description:
Raven black hair seems to absorb the little light in the room, framing
a dark, fine boned face and dark slitted eyes.  An aura of power and
evil surround her like a permanent cloak, and strange incantations flow
from her lips.  A black symbol shimmers on her forehead, the mark
of house Reykaris:

                        ->*<-

mobiles.name: drakiri toryan erkek
mobiles.long_description: Uzun kanatlara sahip, siyahlara bürünmüþ bir erkek burada bekliyor.
mobiles.description:
Slitted eyes like slashes of darkness gaze back at you.  You sense
an aura of complete evil and corruption radiating from this man..
He bears the mark of the deiayan (consort) of she'vale Reykaris.

mobiles.name: drakiri janalis bayan
mobiles.long_description: Bir kumandan drakiri bayaný burada bekliyor.
mobiles.description:
An aura of power and command radiate from the slender figure.
Despite her beauty, you sense something evil and deadly behind the
blue eyes and pale golden hair.  The mark of the Reykaris sh'aya
is emblazoned along her collar.

mobiles.name: drakiri dýreyva
mobiles.long_description: Karalara bürünmüþ bir drakiri seni izliyor.
mobiles.description:
Dark slitted eyes seem to follow your every move.  You notice the
mark of the Reykaris sequas on her collar.

mobiles.name: drakiri delirus erkek
mobiles.long_description: Kara bir drakiri erkeði burada, büyü mýrýldanýyor.
mobiles.description:
He notices you watching him and smiles nastily, sending a shiver
of warning down your spine.  Along the collar is the mark of the
Reykaris treye, the third in command.

mobiles.name: drakiri kýranal
mobiles.long_description: Bir drakiri varlýðýný kanatlarýný açarak karþýlýyor.
mobiles.description:
Jet black hair frames a handsome çora face.  Dark slitted eyes
glare at you angrily.  Between his eyebrows shimmers the black dot
of the heir to Reykaris.

mobiles.name: drakiri sorina çocuk
mobiles.long_description: Bir drakiri çocuðu kirlenmiþ kemiklerle oynuyor.
mobiles.description:
She seems to be playing with a collection of humanoid bones, polished
to a ghastly white gleam.  Noticing your gaze, she giggles and hurls
a skull at you, bearly missing your shoulder.  The dark eyes flash
mischieviously.  You notice a dark mark along one cheekbone indicating
her status as an ira'deia, younger child, of house Reykaris.

mobiles.name: drakiri lorin kýz
mobiles.long_description: Narin bir kýz gölgelerin ardýndan seni izliyor.
mobiles.description:
Dark slitted eyes gleam from the shadows, and the thin lips part in
a bitter not-smile.  One hand draws back, and the light glints off
a silvery throwing dagger balanced in her palm.  Along one cheekbone
is the mark of an ira'deia of house Reykaris.

mobiles.name: drakiri çake erkek
mobiles.long_description: Genç bir drakiri erkeði burada, çalýþýyor.
mobiles.description:
Short, jet black hair frames a narrow face with high cheekbones and dark
slitted eyes.  The mark of an ira'deian glimmers along one cheekbone.

mobiles.name: tamu muhafýzý
mobiles.long_description: Bir tamu muhafýzý av arýyor.
mobiles.description: A rabid reddish light flickers behind narrow green cat eyes.

mobiles.name: uluyan eðilmiþ canavar figürü
mobiles.long_description: Eðilmiþ bir figür uluyor!
mobiles.description:
A warped figure resembling a huge dog with glowing red eyes and
four long muscular legs ending in wicked claws stands here, straining
against the magic which holds it.  The red eyes glint, and
the long muzzle opens to emit a furious, ear-piercing screech!

mobiles.name: þeytani figür gözler
mobiles.long_description: Delirmiþ kýzýl gözler karanlýðýn içinden seni seyrediyor.
mobiles.description:
Barely visible in the darkness, you notice a disfigured shape behind
the eyes.  Twisted lips part to reveal cruel white canines.  The
figure emits a threatening snarl..

mobiles.name: balmumu heykel barudi kara figür
mobiles.long_description: Karalara bürünmüþ bir figürün balmumundan heykeli burada bekliyor.
mobiles.description:
The statue is intricately molded and seems almost alive..
The blood red eyes seem to glow with a hellish fire.  Long,
clawed fingers are extended before the figure as if casting a
spell.  As you continue your scrutiny, thin lips draw back in a
blood-freezing snarl, and a trail of very real blood drips from
the gleaming white fangs!

mobiles.name: sürünen dokunaçlar
mobiles.long_description: Sürünen dokunaçlar üzerine doðru ilerliyor!
mobiles.description:
Thick black tentacles the width of your head twine and writh
menacingly.  The tentacles part momentarily, and you notice a
round, fanged mouth at the center, dripping blood.

mobiles.name: çaðrýlmýþ þeytan figür iri
mobiles.long_description: Ýri bir figür seni süzüyor.
mobiles.description: You catch a glimpse of hellish red eyes and wickedly sharp black talons.

mobiles.name: drakiri jena gözler
mobiles.long_description: Karanlýðýn içinde her an tetikte olan gözler farkediyorsun.
mobiles.description:
You make out a slender shape crouched warily in the darkness.  The
silver eyes gleam from a dark, narrow face like twin daggers.
>From the area of the forehead, a silver mark shimmers:

                        -=+)>

mobiles.name: drakiri nerakis þekil
mobiles.long_description: Ýnce yapýlý bir þekil gölgelerin içine sinmiþ.
mobiles.description:
The slender form of a drakyri is nearly invisible in the shadows.
His wary stance betrays a dangerous catlike grace.  You notice
that he bears the mark of a deiayan of house Myrxes.

mobiles.name: drakiri katire figür
mobiles.long_description: Karalara bürünmüþ bir figür sessizce seni izliyor.
mobiles.description:
Lean honed muscles balance with the grace of a cat.  The dark slitted
eyes seem to follow your every move.  Along one dark collar, you notice
the mark of the Myrxes sh'aya.

mobiles.name: drakiri riksis
mobiles.long_description: Bir drakiri gölgelerin içinde dolaþýyor.
mobiles.description:
Slitted emerald green eyes watch you measuringly from a darkly handsome
elvish face.  The figure seems at home in the shadows and occasionally
merges with them, disappearing from sight.  Along the collar, he
wears the mark of a sequen, second in command of Myrxes.

mobiles.name: drakiri gideyas þekil
mobiles.long_description: Narin bir þekil gölgelerin içine süzülüyor.
mobiles.description:
In the darkness, you can barely make out a slim figure and the arches of
dark wings.  Dark slitted eyes glitter dangerously from a fair, fine
boned face.  The mark of the Myrxes treye, third in command, is
emblazoned on his collar.

mobiles.name: drakiri bayan dirayna
mobiles.long_description: Bir drakiri bayaný sessizce yürüyor.
mobiles.description:
Long hair so black it blends into the shadows frames a pretty, high
cheekboned face and dark, wary silver eyes.  Though not looking
directly at you, the lady seems to be aware of your movements.  Her
smooth, silent gait displays a dangerous, well controlled power.
Between her eyebrows is the mark of the Myrxes heir.

mobiles.name: drakiri niksi kýz
mobiles.long_description: Narin yapýlý bir kýz gölgelerin içinde geziniyor.
mobiles.description:
The girl moves with a powerful agility that reminds you of a panther.
Slitted silver eyes pierce the darkness to bore into your own.  Along
one cheekbone is the mark of an ira'deia of Myrxes.

mobiles.name: drakiri delise
mobiles.long_description: Bir drakiri gölgelerin içinden beliriyor.
mobiles.description: Pale green cat eyes seem to glow with a silent power.

mobiles.name: kara panter
mobiles.long_description: Kara bir panter hiç ses çýkarmadan yeryüzünü adýmlýyor.
mobiles.description:
Powerful muscles ripple beneath a shadow black coat.  Emerald green
cat eyes flicker constantly around the room, taking in everything.

mobiles.name: gölge vaþak
mobiles.long_description: Bir gölge vaþaðý gölgelerin içinde dolaþýyor.
mobiles.description:
The form of a huge, dark lynx is barely visible in the shadows.
Slitted silver eyes flicker towards you, and she hisses in warning.

mobiles.name: gece kara atmaca
mobiles.long_description: Kocaman kara bir atmaca havada asýlý duruyor.
mobiles.description:
She hovers silently, powerful wings outspread.  Beneath the intelligent
dark eyes, a cruel black beak opens to emit a shrill scream of challenge!

mobiles.name: avcý gölge þekil
mobiles.long_description: Gölgelerin içinde bir figür sessizce dolaþýyor.
mobiles.description:
The form flits through the shadows with a dangerous silent speed.
The head turns towards you for a moment, fixing you with a sinister
silver gaze that sends a chill up your spine.

mobiles.name: avcý ok
mobiles.long_description: Gümüþten bir okun seni izlediðini farkediyorsun.
mobiles.description:
A lithe humanoid form crouches in the shadows, aiming a silvery
arrow at you with dangerous accuracy.

mobiles.name: drakiri bayan diyana
mobiles.long_description: Güçlü bir drakiri bayaný dikkatle seni izliyor.
mobiles.description:
Your eyes are held by a commanding grey gaze.  The lady seems to assess
you even as you watch her.  She bears the weight of full armor, betraying
honed muscles despite the slender build.  On her forehead is the shimmering
grey mark of myr'vale Xaek:

                        ][+][

mobiles.name: drakiri rike lord
mobiles.long_description: Bir drakiri lordu güç yayýyor.
mobiles.description:
Lean, powerful muscles indicate a lifetime of physical training
and weapons work.  Along the collar is the mark of the deiayan (consort)
of the head of house Xaek.

mobiles.name: drakiri niksil
mobiles.long_description: Altýn saçlý bir drakiri pratik yapýyor.
mobiles.description:
Flashing swords gleam in a fast, dangerous dance as the lady skims
through sword maneuvers that seem as easy to her as breathing.  Slitted
golden eyes gleam with adrenaline and a commanding power as she glances
up to meet your gaze.  On her collar, she bears the mark of the
Xaek's first commander (sh'aya).

mobiles.name: drakiri rakayel diþi savaþçý
mobiles.long_description: Diþi bir drakiri savaþçýsý kýlýç yeteneðini geliþtiriyor.
mobiles.description:
Silver hair and silver eyes flash in the light as the warrior works
gracefully through sword maneuvers.  As she spins and parries with
dizzying speed and grace, she seems almost one with her sword.
She wears the mark of the sequas, second commander, of Xaek.

mobiles.name: drakiri yeven erkek
mobiles.long_description: Kaslý vücuduyla bir drakiri erkeði iþiyle uðraþýyor.
mobiles.description:
He seems to be going over some sort of maps.  Powerful muscles bulge
beneath leather practice armor, yet he moves with a quickness that
make this man a dangerous enemy.  Emblazoned on his collar, you notice
the mark of the Xaek treye, third commander.

mobiles.name: drakiri versant çocuk
mobiles.long_description: Uzunca bir drakiri çocuðu kýz kardeþiyle tartýþýyor.
mobiles.description:
Short golden hair frames a handsome, sculpted çora face and brilliant
green eyes.  He towers several inches above you, yet his honed
muscles maintain the perfect balance of a warrior.  A grey dot in the
center of his forehead marks him as the na'deia (heir) to Xaek.

mobiles.name: drakiri sayera kýz
mobiles.long_description: Narin vücuduyla bir drakiri kýzý erkek kardeþiyle tartýþýyor.
mobiles.description:
Mithril flashes in a silvery blur as the girl slashes and dodges with
deadly speed and accuracy.  Along her cheekbone is the mark of
an ira'deia.

mobiles.name: gri aslan
mobiles.long_description: Ýrice bir gri aslan burada bekliyor.
mobiles.description:
Grey fur shimmers over powerful muscles.  Intelligent golden eyes
follow you warily.

mobiles.name: beyaz aslan
mobiles.long_description: Ýrice bir beyaz aslan burada duruyor.
mobiles.description:
The lion moves with a powerful, silent grace which is strangely at odds
with her size.  Deep emerald eyes flicker around the room.

mobiles.name: muhafýz þövalye
mobiles.long_description: Bir þövalye etrafý gözlüyor.
mobiles.description: The knight is tall, powerful, and quite ready to defend.

mobiles.name: drakiri savaþçý
mobiles.long_description: Bir drakiri savaþçý savunma yeteneklerini geliþtiriyor.
mobiles.description:
The drakyri works through defensive maneuvers over and over, with
growing agility and quickness.

mobiles.name: drakiri savaþçý tartýþan
mobiles.long_description: Bir drakiri savaþçýsý burada, tartýþýyor.
mobiles.description: The warrior seems quite intent on weapons work.

mobiles.name: drakiri yiksanes erkek
mobiles.long_description: Uzun boylu bir drakiri erkeði burada duruyor.
mobiles.description:
A thin niobium circlet confines short golden hair, framing brilliant
green eyes and a powerfully sculpted çora face.  Centered between
the arched brows is the shimmering green insignia of myr'vale Noriva:

                           -(+)-

mobiles.name: drakiri nerayel bayan
mobiles.long_description: Beyazlar içinde bir drakiri bayaný burada duruyor.
mobiles.description:
Cascades of shimmering hair the color of white gold fall in waves down
the lady's white clad back, between delicate iridescent wings.
Above the fine, high cheekbones, clear silver eyes sparkle with energy.
On her collar, the lady bears the mark of the deiaya of myr'vale Noriva.

mobiles.name: drakiri jorine kadýn
mobiles.long_description: Bir drakiri kadýný meditasyon yapýyor.
mobiles.description:
An aura of health and power surrounds her.  A mark on her collar
indicates her rank as sh'aya of myr'vale (minor house) Noriva.

mobiles.name: drakiri lerilke paladin
mobiles.long_description: Bir drakiri paladini ibadet ediyor.
mobiles.description:
The paladin emanates peace and health.  Contrary to human beliefs,
drakyri paladins do not need to be purely good.  In this case,
Lerylke is the sequen of myr'vale Noriva, a neutral house.  Hence,
he is neutral and worships neutral gods and goddesses.

mobiles.name: drakiri nerra erkek
mobiles.long_description: Bir drakiri erkeði yabani ot topluyor.
mobiles.description:
Despite his scruffy work clothing, Nerr emanates health and power.
His slitted golden eyes are narrowed in concentration as he heightens
the health of the herbs as he weeds.

mobiles.name: drakiri yiliyra bayan
mobiles.long_description: Uzun boylu bir drakiri bayaný þifalý otlar üzerine çalýþýyor.
mobiles.description:
She twirls a lock of shiny white gold hair between her fingers as she
concentrates.  Iridescent wings drape down her back, lifting
occasionally to stretch.  Between her eyebrows shimmers the green
dot of the Noriva na'deia.

mobiles.name: drakiri dirina kýz
mobiles.long_description: Genç bir drakiri kýzý gülüyor.
mobiles.description:
Shimmering golden hair falls in a curtain down her back, between
fluttering iridescent wings.  Lively green gold eyes sparkle
with laughter.  Yet beneath the youthful smile, you sense great power.
On one cheekbone, she bears the mark of an ira'deia of Noriva.

mobiles.name: drakiri voril oðlan
mobiles.long_description: Uzun boylu bir drakiri oðlaný burada, çalýþýyor.
mobiles.description:
He seems to be engrossed in a tome on healing.  Wavy white gold hair,
cut short, frames a handsome, youthful face and sparkling green eyes.
Along one cheekbone is the mark of a Noriva ira'deian.

mobiles.name: beyaz kedi
mobiles.long_description: Beyaz bir kedi dolaþýyor.
mobiles.description:
Snowy white fur gleams softly in the light.  You feel the urge to pet
it.. but as you reach out your hand, the slitted green eyes snap open
and the cat hisses warningly.

mobiles.name: gri kedi gümüþi
mobiles.long_description: Gümüþi bir gri kedi sessizce ilerliyor.
mobiles.description:
Silvery grey fur shimmers in the light.  Bright silver cat eyes
follow you warily.

mobiles.name: drakiri muhafýz ruh þekil hayalet
mobiles.long_description: Hayalete benzer bir þekil burada bekliyor.
mobiles.description:
As you gaze at it, the form seems to sharpen and come into focus.
It appears to be the spirit of a drakyri, long dead and set to
guard here.

mobiles.name: drakiri büyücü alev
mobiles.long_description: Güçlü bir drakiri büyücüsü alev aurasýnýn içinde bekliyor.
mobiles.description:
Even her eyes seem to glow with a strange, reddish light.  You
sense an aura of raw magical power around her, controllable only
by the best.. which she is.

mobiles.name: drakiri paladin kalkan
mobiles.long_description: Bir drakiri paladini kontrol ettiði güçle parlýyor.
mobiles.description:
He seems almost too bright to look at, and you are forced to avert your
gaze after a brief glance.  He is the Shield, one of the most
devoted and powerful of the drakyri knights, and a member of the
elite force of drakyri, the Laerkai.

mobiles.name: pençe drakiri þövalye uðursuz
mobiles.long_description: Karalara bürünmüþ uðursuz bir þövalye burada bekliyor.
mobiles.description:
The drakyri emanates an aura of pure evil power.  Noting your gaze,
she smiles a cruel not-smile and flexes wickedly sharp taloned hands.

mobiles.name: gölge gölgeler drakiri
mobiles.long_description: Buradaki gölgeler koyu ve derin.
mobiles.description:
You notice a slim figure shrouded in the deep shadows.  He turns, and
sharp silver eyes pierce the darkness like knife blades.  His movements
are characterized by a curious catlike grace which betrays extreme
power and agility, both dangerous.

mobiles.name: savaþçý drakiri yumruk
mobiles.long_description: Güçlü bir drakiri savaþçýsý burada bekliyor.
mobiles.description:
She towers at least a head above you, muscles rippling beneath the
plates of her armor.  Her sheer might would best most warriors in
combat, and as she moves her sword, you see that she has the skill
to be a master.

mobiles.name: din adamý el drakiri
mobiles.long_description: Güçlü bir drakiri din adamý beyaz bir ýþýða bürünmüþ.
mobiles.description:
Though not much taller than yourself, the drakyri seems to tower
far above you, as if possessed by some divine presense.

mobiles.name: drakiri efendi layerkayi
mobiles.long_description: Narin yapýlý bir drakiri güç oluþturuyor.
mobiles.description:
The brilliant silver eyes of the master Laerkai look deep into your
own, as if scouring your soul.  She is the leader of the Laerkai, the
elite protective force of the race, a rank which she has won through
centuries of power and loyalty.  Though each of the six Laerkai beneath
her represents a single house and excels in that house's specialty,
the master comes from a union between the Deriki and Myrxes houses.
Trained by both, she has become a lethal blend of sorcery and stealth.

mobiles.name: drakiri muhafýzý
mobiles.long_description: Muhafýz seni izliyor.
mobiles.description:
The Guardian is a drakyri raised and trained specially to guard and serve
the drakyri council.  She excels at many skills, due to decades of
devotion and training, and is a formidable opponent.

mobiles.name: drakiri arabulucu ýþýk gri
mobiles.long_description: Gri bir ýþýk odayý dolduruyor.
mobiles.description:
The light seems to shift and change even as you look at it.  This is
the drakyri Mediator, a blend of the souls of those drakyri who devoted
their lives to the increase of wisdom and willingly gave their souls
in death to serve the council.  The Mediator resides over the council
when it is in session and resolves disputes.  Due to its ancient wisdom,
it passes the final judgment on all issues that affect the race as a whole.

mobiles.name: drakiri þövalye koruyucu
mobiles.long_description: Bir drakiri þövalyesi burada bekliyor.
mobiles.description:
This is a knight trained by myr'vale Xaek and sworn to guard and
protect the land and its inhabitants til death.

mobiles.name: drakiri koruyuvu büyücü
mobiles.long_description: Bir drakiri büyücüsü burada bekliyor.
mobiles.description:
Trained by she'vale Deriki, this mage is sworn to protect the land
and its inhabitants until death.

mobiles.name: drakiri þifacý
mobiles.long_description: Bir drakiri þifacýsý burada duruyor.
mobiles.description:
This is a cleric trained by myr'vale Noriva to tend to the health
of the land and its inhabitants.  The healer has no allegiances
except to the isle as a whole and answers to no one but the laerkai
master, the mediator, and the warden.

mobiles.name: drakiri suikastçi
mobiles.long_description: Bir drakiri suikastçisi gölgelerin içinde bekliyor.
mobiles.description:
This drakyri has been trained by myr'vale Myrxes to perform special
jobs in the outside world.  The assassin answers mainly to the laerkai
master, and occasionally to the mediator or warden.

mobiles.name: zayýf drakiri yaþlý adam
mobiles.long_description: Zayýf ve yaþlý bir adam sana gülümsüyor.
mobiles.description:
You sense something strange about this old man..  Aware of your
scrutiny, he glances up, revealing sparkling blue eyes which hold
a youthful power which is quite at odds with his apparent frailty.
He winks at you and returns to his work.

mobiles.name: drakiri bekçi
mobiles.long_description: Bekçi burada, kapýlarý koruyor.
mobiles.description:
The Warden is one of the most powerful drakyri, assigned to guard the
gates to the isle against hostile invasion.  Her sharp silver eyes,
slitted like a cat's catch and hold your own, seeming to weigh your
very soul.

extra_descriptions.description:
Blue marble, so dark as to appear black in patches where shadows have
fallen over the stone, has been sculpted into the form of a tall
sorceress, hands raised in the act of casting a spell.  Crystalline
water splashes from the sorceress' open palm, sparkling like colour
spray in the light.  The narrow face and chiseled cheekbones appear
elven, but twin wings rise from the shoulderblades, sculpted feathers
cascading over the sorceress' back like a cloak.

The carved form depicts a kneeling drakyri dressed long flowing robes.
His hands are cupped before him, as if in supplication.  Nestled between
the hands is a carved bowl filled with cloudy white liquid.

ripples and clears, leaving only your reflection.. or perhaps the vision
was just your imagination?  The water sparkles in the light.

rooms.name: Wooded Path
rooms.description:
You stand on a narrow path winding through the forest.  To the south,
the path enters a small grove of trees.

rooms.name: Strange Grove
rooms.description:
The air seems strangely silent here, devoid even of birdsong.  Tall trees
frame the clearing, their leaves motionless in the still air.  In the
center of the clearing rests a circular pool of clear water.  A narrow
path leads into the forest to the north.  A dark stone plaque lies
next to the pool, nearly buried in the grass.

exits.description: A path leads northward between the trees.
Silvery gates.

rooms.name: Chamber of the Panther
rooms.description:
Engravings of prowling and striking panthers grace the dark onyx walls,
so intricate that they almost seem alive..  The polished form of a
leaping panther arcs above the door to the south, forming an archway.
The door itself is flush with the wall and nearly invisible.

exits.description:
A stalking panther is engraved in the east wall.  Above the panther,
you notice the slim form of a flying dagger.

Carved above the leaping panther, you notice the inscription:

                     Myr'vale Myrxes Nyxi Ira'deia

Yumuþak gri çizgilerle bezeli kara mermer görüyorsun.

Bir fýrlatma hançeri güzel bir biçimde kuzey duvarýna resmedilmiþ. Dikkatle
bakýnca kabzasýnda bazý kelimeler görüyorsun:

                    Myr'vale Myrxes Dyraena Na'deia

Küçük cam bir koruma ile kaplanmýþ 3 hançer görüyorsun.Ortadaki hançer dar
kabzalý,ince bir tane,büyük ihtimalle bir fýrlatma hançeri.Mithrilin gümüþi

iþlenmiþ durumda. Saðdaki hançer ötekisinden daha uzun ve oniksten yapýlma.
Bir panter resmi hançerin soðuk çeliði boyunca iþlenmiþ. Bilenmiþ çelik solda

bir vaþak resmi var.Bir tür büyülü korumanýn tehditkar parýltýsý cam koruma ve
masa üstünde oynaþýyor.

bölüyor. Batýdaki odanýn kapýsýnýn üstünü saldýran bir vaþak kaplýyor.

                   Myr'vale Myrxes Delise Ira'deia

                 Myr'vale Myrxes Neraikis Deiayan

Granitle kaplý bir kubbeyle korunan,kalýn geniþ sütunlarla çevrili bir
odadasýn.Sarmal demir kapýlar doðuda avluya giriþi belirtiyorlar ve

rooms.name: Demir koridor

Kuleler üstündeki kuzey-güney doðrultusunda bir koridordasýn. Kalýn çelik
kapýlar batýya uzanýyor, iþlemeli bir meþe kapý ise doðuya. Koridor kuzeye

Üstünde Xaek armasý olan meþe bir kapý doðuda uzanýyor.
Koridor güneye devam ediyor.
Batý duvarýnda ikili çelik kapýlar bulunuyor.

rooms.description:
Koridor güneyde kalýn,çelik kapýlarla son buluyor. Kapýnýn üstünde Xaek'in
armasý kýlýç ve kalkanýn üstünde bulunuyor.

Kalýn çelik bir kapý güneye açýlýyor.

rooms.name: Private Arena
rooms.description:
Tall iron walls enclose a wide circular arena.  Thick sand covers the
floor, scuffed by recent practice bouts.  Dark clumps of what appear
to be dried blood clot the sand in places.  A thick steel door leads
out of the arena to the north.

exits.description: A thick steel door is set into the north wall.

rooms.name: Training and Practice Field
rooms.description:
A wide grassy field stretches out around you, the grass torn up
frequently, probably by recent weapons practice.  Huge double steel
doors reenter the house to the east.  A long wooden building frames the
rest of the practice field, entered through doors to the north,
west, and south.

exits.description: A plain oak door enters the building to the north.
Double steel doors are set into the wall to the east.
A plain mahogany door opens southward.
An beechwood door opens westward.

rooms.name: Second Comander's Office
rooms.description:
You stand in a sparsely furnished office framed by plain oak panelled
walls.  A desk rests near the western wall, accompanied by several
cabinets.  An oak door to the south leads out of the room.  An
inscription in bronze glimmers above the doorway, the only ornamentation
in the room.

exits.description:
An oak door exits the room to the south.
Above the doorway, a bronze inscription reads:

                  Myr'vale Xaek Rakael Sequas

extra_descriptions.description:
The inscription reads:

                  Myr'vale Xaek Rakael Sequas

rooms.name: First Commander's Office
rooms.description:
Varnished white beechwood walls frame a spacious office.  Polished
forms the floor, and a large window overlooks the practice field
to the east.  Next to the window stands a beechwood door carved with
an inscription in burnished bronze.

exits.description:
A beechwood door leads out of the office to the east.
Carved in bronze are the words:

                  Myr'vale Xaek Nyxil Sh'aya

extra_descriptions.description:
The inscription reads:

                  Myr'vale Xaek Nyxil Sh'aya

rooms.name: Third Commander's Office
rooms.description:
The varnished reddish brown of mahogany wall panels glimmers slightly
in the torchlight.  Darker wood forms a doorframe around the door to
the north.  Engraved above the door is an inscription in bronze.

exits.description:
Engraved in the dark wood above the door to the north is an
inscription:

                  Myr'vale Xaek Yeven Treye

extra_descriptions.description:
The inscription reads:

                  Myr'vale Xaek Yeven Treye

rooms.name: Iron Hallway
rooms.description:
The hallway comes to an abrupt end before two huge granite doors.
The depiction of a huge lion is carved in relief at the crest of
the archway above the doors, its sculpted eyes appearing to follow
your every move.  Across the center of the doors, a crest is
carved into the stone.

exits.description:
Huge double granite doors are set into the north wall.  Engraved
across the face of the doors is the house crest, surrounded by
an inscription:

   Myr'vale Xaek Dyana Deia    ][+][    Myr'vale Xaek Ryke Deiayan
The hallway continues south.

extra_descriptions.description:
The crest of house Xaek is engraved in the granite doors, surrounded
by an inscription:

   Myr'vale Xaek Dyana Deia    ][+][    Myr'vale Xaek Ryke Deiayan

rooms.name: Marble Bedchamber
rooms.description:
You find yourself in a huge bedchamber walled with white streaked grey
marble.  Parted white silk tapestries to the north reveal an engraving
of a huge prowling lion.  A white marble archway frames huge double
granite doors in the south wall.

exits.description: Double granite doors lead out of the chamber to the south.

extra_descriptions.description:
The intricate engraving reveals lithe, powerful muscles and a proud
feline head.  Beneath the engraving, you notice the inscription:

                 - Myr'vale  Xaek -

            Strength    ][+][    Power

                        Wrath
                     of the Lion

rooms.name: Jade Entry Hall
rooms.description:
The light from thick wax candles spaced in niches along the walls
plays over jade walls, permeating the hall with a soft greenish glow.
A burnished bronze door stands framed by a dark jade archway to the
north.  A corridor exits the hall to the south.

exits.description:
Carved into the archway above the door is the inscription:

                   Myr'vale Noriva

                        -(+)-

                   House of Healing
A jade corridor leads south.

rooms.name: Jade Corridor
rooms.description:
Polished jade forms the walls of a short north-south corridor, the
green of the stone fading from dark to light and back again.
The walls seem to glow with an inner light, giving the darker portions
the impression of long patches of phosphorescent moss.  A white
door leads east and a glass door south.  The corridor continues west.

exits.description: A jade entry hall is visible to the north.

Set into the eastern wall is a tall white door of varnished ashwood.
Engraved above the doorway is a depiction of an open hand centered over
a glowing ring.

Through the glass door to the south, you can make out the green of
a garden.
The corridor continues west.

rooms.name: Shrine of Healing
rooms.description:
You stand in a small, jade walled shrine.  In the center of the shrine,
a low white marble dais supports a kneeling statue of a praying drakyri.
Arranged around the dais are several padded wooden pallets.  Slim
white candles in niches around the room and on the dais light the room
with a soft glow.  You feel healthy and at peace here.

exits.description:
A white ashwood door opens westward.  Engraved in the face of the door
is the crest of house Noriva.

rooms.name: Garden Path
rooms.description:
The mingled odor of fresh herbs and fresh earth permeates the air with
a sweet earthy scent.  To the east and west, a variety of herbs are
planted in neat rows, separated by short white markers.  The path on
which you stand winds southwards towards a large white wooden gazebo.
A glass door leads into the house to the north.

exits.description: To the north, a glass door opens into the house.
The path terminates to the south at a large white gazebo.

rooms.name: White Gazebo
rooms.description:
You stand in the shade of a large white gazebo.  Woven wood arcs above,
leaving streaks of light and shadow on the grey marble floor.  A large
herb garden surrounds the gazebo on all sides, save the north, where
a narrow path winds up to a large white house.

exits.description: A garden path winds north towards a large house.

rooms.name: Jade Corridor
rooms.description:
The soft glow of candlelight shimmers over deep green jade walls.
Varnished wood doors lead north, south, and west, and a staircase spirals
upwards towards a pair of double white doors above.

exits.description:
An ashwood door is set into the northern wall.  Gold lettering in the
face of the door forms a short inscription:

                    Myr'vale Noriva Dryna Ira'deia
The corridor continues east.

A redwood door opens southward.  Inlayed in gold in the face of the
door are the letters:

                   Myr'vale Noriva Voryl Ira'deian

A door made of teakwood is set into the western wall.  An inscription
in the face of the door reads:

                   Myr'vale Noriva Yllyra Na'deia

Double white oaken doors are visible above.  Engraved in the marble
archway framing the doors is the inscription:

                  Myr'vale Noriva Yxanes Deian

                             -(+)-

                 Myr'vale Noriva Nerael Deiayan

rooms.name: Candlelit Bedroom
rooms.description:
Light from a single white candle, supported on a table in the center
of the room, glows golden amidst varnished ashwood wall panels.
Engraved in the eastern wall, above the canopied bed, is a depiction
of an open hand over a glowing ring.  A golden inscription glimmers above
the door to the south.

exits.description:
An ashwood doors exits the room to the south.  A golden inscription
above the door reads:

                 Myr'vale Noriva Dryna Ira'deia

extra_descriptions.description: A tall white candle glows brightly.
Beneath the hand is the crest of house Noriva.

The inscription reads:

                 Myr'vale Noriva Dryna Ira'deia

rooms.name: Teak Panelled Bedroom
rooms.description:
The golden grains of teak wall panels glow warmly in the torchlight.
Carved above the doorway to the east is a strange, five-pointed leaf.
Beneath the leaf, you notice an inscription in gold.

exits.description:
Above the teakwood door to the east is an inscription:

                 Myr'vale Noriva Yllyra Na'deia

extra_descriptions.description: A strange five-pointed leaf is carved in the golden wood above the doorway.

The inscription reads:

                 Myr'vale Noriva Yllyra Na'deia

rooms.name: Booklined Bedroom
rooms.description:
Bookshelves line the east and south walls, and a large canopied bed
rests against the west wall.  Battered tomes of herb lore and
handwritten parchment notes are stacked neatly on the shelves, labelled
in some strange, ornate script.  A redwood door opens northward.  Above
the doorway, you notice a short inscription in gold.

exits.description:
Above the redwood door to the north is the inscription:

                 Myr'vale Noriva Voryl Ira'deian

extra_descriptions.description: Myr'vale Noriva Voryl Ira'deian

rooms.name: Sunlit Bedchamber
rooms.description:
Curved glass panels form a domed roof overhead, filling the chamber
with the warm glow of sunlight.  An inlayed engraving of a huge bear
fills the north wall, gleaming gold against the deep green jade.
Double white oaken doors open onto the stairwell to the floor below.

exits.description:
Engraved in gold across the face of the doors is the inscription:

                  Myr'vale Noriva Yxanes Deian

                             -(+)-

                 Myr'vale Noriva Nerael Deiayan

extra_descriptions.description:
The engraving depicts a huge, shaggy bear, an epitome of strength
and health.
